reviews.review_content:
Luci is one of the sweetest professors. She was so easy going and let everyone go at their own pace. The levels in the class ranged dramatically but she catered to everyone's needs wonderfully.  She was very encouraging and really helped everyone improve their strokes no matter their skill.
Workload:
PE attendance policy.... although Luci was rather lenient. Although she takes attendance everyday, I'm pretty sure I missed more than the allowed amount but passed anyways. maybe i didn't. but i'm pretty sure i did. also she was really good about letting everyone know about make-up opportunities.

she's really great.she doesn't forcibly make you swim lengths that you're not comfortable with. she works with everyone at their own individual pace. she's friendly and makes swimming less painful for 1st timers...
Workload:
n/a

Everyone loves Luci - she tries to learn everyones names and uses them frequently (even of not correctly), gives the students a lot of personal attention and is really approachable.
Workload:
Standard PE stuff, she is relatively easy on lateness etc.
